content.text: Hey! I love romance novels. I started a blog to talk about them. What do you think of romance novels?
I love them! I'm a huge fan of historical romance and contemporary romance. I also like to read paranormal romance.
That's great! I love historical romance as well. I'm currently reading a book about a viking romance.
Oh, that sounds interesting! I've never read a viking romance before.
I highly recommend it! It's a really good book.
I'll have to check it out. Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! I'm always happy to talk about romance novels.
Me too! It's one of my favorite topics.
That's a tough question! I have so many favorites. But I think I'd have to say my favorite is "The Thorn Birds." It's a classic romance novel that I've read multiple times.
I've heard of that book! I've been meaning to check it out.
You should! It's a really good book.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation!
